org.apache.xerces.impl.dv

Interface ValidationContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigurableValidationState, ValidationState

    public interface ValidationContext
    ValidationContext has all the information required for the validation of: id, idref, entity, notation, qname
    Version:
    $Id: ValidationContext.java 1171147 2011-09-15 15:44:30Z knoaman $
    Author:
    Sandy Gao, IBM

    INTERNAL:

    Usage of this class is not supported. It may be altered or removed at any time.
